sentences.sentence: He helped design the "transputer" technology used in countless set-top boxes.
sentences.translation: 他帮助设计了运用在无数机顶盒中的“晶片机”技术。

sentences.sentence: Experimental works has been carried out by using a transputer-based parallel processing system.
sentences.translation: 实验系统是建立在以传输电脑为基础的平行处理系统上。
